name: Easiteach Next Generation Document
summary: Learn about .ETNG files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The ETNG file is the main file type associated with Easiteach Next Generation. The file is created when a user saves a lesson by selecting File → Save or Save As... and chooses the ETNG format. ETNG files may also be saved as .JPG, .PDF, or IWB files.
To open an ETNG file, select File → Open and navigate to the location of the file.
NOTE: Easiteach Next Generation replaced Easiteach, which used .ET files to save lesson data.

description: An ETNG file is a document created by Easiteach Next Generation, whiteboard software used to create and present interactive lessons. It contains lesson data such as layouts, navigation, images, text, themes, and animations.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .etng file in RM Easiteach Next Generation 1
images.caption: ETNG file open in RM Easiteach Next Generation 1
